name: Ruined (itch)
description:
Jacob was exploring the ancient Greek ruins on a fine Saturday. However, Jacob being the unobservant idiot he is, fell into a hole. Resulting in him getting stuck in labyrinth with nothing but a jetpack.

Your job is to help him escape this labyrinth, while stealing as many coins as possible.

This game is a submission for the NES Game Jam, a jam in which developers are challenged to make a game that looks, sounds, and plays like an NES Game.

I sadly didn't get much done, as happened to be very busy this week.  I lost my save file, so I just have to submit what I have.

CONTROLS

==========

Left Arrow: Go Left

Right Arrow: Go Right

Up Arrow: Jetpack

Down Arrow: Interact
